review.title: “Work From Home Experience”
review.pros: Pros – With today's struggles with affording health care, personal finances and the need and want for individuals to seek a more natural approach to health; Q international's focus is to help individuals do just that! Through nutritional products as well as water and air products consumers are able to lead a healthier lifestyle and are improving their own health which in turn is helping many in reducing their incurred costs that they were spending on traditional expenses.The opportunity for a work at home job, part time or full time, exists for many who enjoy helping others and has been a wonderful way to help supplement income in this economy, without having to spend alot of money out of pocket like alot of other direct sales companies via high start up costs, monthly shipments and website fees.
review.cons: Cons – I do not have any cons to this job, company or products thus far.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The training and customer service is exceptional and shows in the support and money back guaruntees that you provide. keep doing what you're doing!
review.recommended: – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
